original_text: The Lord will also bring on you every kind of sickness and disaster not recorded in this Book of the Law, until you are destroyed.
korean_text: 또 이 율법책에 기록하지 아니한 모든 질병과 모든 재앙을 네가 멸망하기까지 여호와께서 네게 내리실 것이니

sentences.original_text: The Lord will also bring on you
every kind of sickness and disaster
not recorded in this Book of the Law
